attributes.action: Require the Union Flag to be flown on public buildings and schools!
attributes.background:
We call upon the Government to require that the Union Flag should be flown on public buildings and state schools all year round.

We are a proud independent country with a rich history.

Let us celebrate that history by flying our Union Flag.
